    • Method Detail

      • setVerbose

        public static void setVerbose(boolean v)
        Indicate that we want verbose logging. The call is ignored if verbose logging is forced by the system property "com.github.mathiewz.slick.forceVerboseLog"
        Parameters:
        v - True if we want verbose logging (INFO and DEBUG)

      • checkVerboseLogSetting

        public static void checkVerboseLogSetting()
        Check if the system property com.github.mathiewz.slick.verboseLog is set to true. If this is the case we activate the verbose logging mode
